code: import*as types from"../types/map";export var startCreatingMap=function startCreatingMap(map){return{type:types.CREATE_MAP_STARTED,payload:map};};export var completeCreatingMap=function completeCreatingMap(oldId,map){return{type:types.CREATE_MAP_COMPLETED,payload:{oldId:oldId,map:map}};};export var failCreatingMap=function failCreatingMap(oldId,error){return{type:types.CREATE_MAP_FAILED,payload:{oldId:oldId,error:error}};};
